Action.author: pandrejko
Action.body: ~negupta When you update the tutorials to use the test network could you do this? I think all of them have it now except BYFN and add an org tutorial. Obviously you would not do this for BYFN at this point.

Action.author: pandrejko
Action.body: This is being done now. We can add this to the Style Guide that ~joe-alewine is putting together.

Action.author: pandrejko
Action.body: This is being done as a matter of practice now.
